CustomField.description: Used by CSMs: If this is an auto-renewal contract, this is the last date on which Circle can unilaterally cancel a contract before it auto-renews. If there is no auto-renewal, this is the date the current contract expires.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this is an auto-renewal contract, this is the last date on which Circle can unilaterally cancel a contract before it auto-renews. If there is no auto-renewal, this is the date the current contract expires.
CustomField.label: Contract Opt Out
